{"id":"chatcmpl-80","object":"chat.completion","created":1765449704,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"{"portionIndex":5,"result":[]}","reasoning":"The instruction: Return JSON only: {"portionIndex":<number>,"result":"short answer"}. Then later says: If phrase appears, output a JSON object with fields HeadingTitle, LineIndex, CharacterOffset for each occurrence in this portion. If not, output an empty array.

Conflicting: initial says return JSON only with portionIndex and result. But later says output JSON object per occurrence or empty array. Probably they want result to be either array of objects or empty array.

Thus format: {"portionIndex":5,"result":[...]} where each element includes HeadingTitle, LineIndex, CharacterOffset.

Check text: It is Russian. Looking for phrase "профессор Звёздочкина" (with accented characters). The given text: "Многих учёных интересует вопрос, как образовались лунные кратеры...". No mention of professor. So not present.

Thus result empty array.

Return: {"portionIndex":5,"result":[]}"},"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":475,"completion_tokens":221,"total_tokens":696}}
